document_data.caption: A map of Oman's Isle showing Skien on the western coast.
document_data.name: Skien
document_data.mainbody: '''Skien''' was a small village located on [[Oman's Isle]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Skien was located along the western coast of Oman's Isle along the [[Old Stone Wood]]. It lay just a few miles north of [[Trondhelm]].
document_data.History: The village was reduced to ruins after [[giant]]s passed through the region during the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles|11}}
